chunks.en: I'd like to know how much everyone usually spends on breakfast?
This morning I tried a different breakfast shop and spent 12 yuan on three small steamed buns and a tea egg.
I personally think it's expensive. I suddenly had the idea to understand everyone's expected breakfast spending. For me, anything starting with 10 yuan is considered expensive ğŸ˜‚
20-25, McDonald's or KFC
Don't eat
@chen15798 On Taobao's homepage, find [é¢†æ·˜é‡‘], click in and search for [McDonald's Breakfast], select a suitable one to order, and see the product details for how to redeem it.
40+ for breakfast every day, at Cafe de Coral
8 yuan today, Lawson - Vegetable Bun + Steamed Twisted Roll + Custard Bun
4 yuan, one vermicelli tofu bun and one tea egg
5 yuan today, a 3 yuan pancake from a Northeast pancake chain store + 2 yuan instant coffee
One bun from FamilyMart, 2.8 yuan

Usually two meat buns and a boiled egg in the morning, 4.5 yuan in total. Meat buns are 1.5 yuan each, boiled egg is 1.5 yuan. I didn't buy soy milk or milk, if I did it would be around six or seven yuan. Now I just drink water at the office instead of milk, I feel like it's considered low.
I usually eat very little for breakfast, around five yuan.
Sometimes I bring my own milk + egg. If I don't, I go to Sanjin Tangbao and buy soy milk + steamed bun.
Two protein bars, less than 10 yuan in total

chunks.en: If I get up early, I go to the company cafeteria, 2 fried dough sticks + 1 bowl of millet porridge + 1 boiled egg + 1 portion of small pickles, 2.8 yuan
A bowl of porridge, a steamed bun, 4 yuan
I've been eating McDonald's for almost a year, less than 15 yuan.
Steamed bun + egg + soy milk, probably 4-5 yuan in the cafeteria
Two vegetable buns, 3 yuan
Boil an egg, soak oatmeal in milk or milk + toast with fried egg, the cost is about 5 yuan to eat well and be full of protein
A serving of rice noodle roll in the cafeteria is 7 yuan, with vegetables and meat, very conscientious
@672795574 #2 Same as Lawson, recently working outside and there are no decent breakfast shops nearby, so I can only eat Lawson. At least the price is acceptable ğŸ˜‚
